Summary: changed shape/colors, loud thought was helicopter but not, electrical
divs: Sighting DetailsWatch and analyze video for yourself. It beamed light. Was extremely loud. You can hear something electrical-like in video when it passes. Very fast. Unbelievable, unearth-like. Vivid colors in video. Lit up sky.Watch in slow motion. Left and came back.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Desert Hot Springs
There were no other sightings in Desert Hot Springs on or around March 5th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
